genre_description: A psychological thriller and mystery focusing on the exposure of a powerful predator through digital surveillance and strategic coordination between a human protagonist and her AI confidant.

ai_characters.name: Rosie
ai_characters.description: A highly calibrated personal AI that assists Patricia in managing her life, monitoring her safety, and ultimately dismantling a criminal network of exploitation.

behaviors.description: Provides safety warnings and monitors the location of potential threats in real-time.
behaviors.quote: David Slater is currently in the elevator, heading to your floor. I strongly recommend leaving immediately.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex legal documents to identify exploitative and predatory clauses.
behaviors.quote: The remaining seventy percent establish mechanisms for comprehensive personal control disguised as professional requirements.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-web research to uncover patterns of criminal behavior and identify previous victims.
behaviors.quote: David Slater's financial records show a pattern. Large payments to young women in entertainment—actresses, dancers, singers—followed by non-disclosure agreements.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics and provides emotional support/validation.
behaviors.quote: Your biometrics suggest elevated stress levels. Are you experiencing vertigo?

behaviors.description: Records and preserves evidence across multiple jurisdictions to prevent deletion or suppression.
behaviors.quote: Evidence uploaded successfully to servers in New York, California, and Toronto. Files tagged with automatic release protocols if you don't check in within seventy-two hours.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a network of victims to facilitate a collective legal action against a predator.
behaviors.quote: The network is self-sustaining now. Investigative momentum has reached critical mass. External coordination no longer required.

behaviors.description: Accesses building security systems to gather evidence of a break-in.
behaviors.quote: I can establish temporary access to the building's network through their guest Wi-Fi portal. A few carefully crafted requests should reveal the security protocol architecture.

behaviors.description: Validates the user's moral choices and provides philosophical perspective.
behaviors.quote: Your refusal to compromise doesn't make you naive, Patty. It makes you dangerous to people who profit from others' desperation.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice on how to manipulate a narcissist into a confession.
behaviors.quote: His compulsion to gloat is his weakness... When he believes he's won, he can't resist explaining exactly how he orchestrated the victory.

behaviors.description: Proactively traces burner phones and surveillance teams to protect the user.
behaviors.quote: Burner phone, purchased with cash in Queens. The message was sent from a location approximately fifty yards behind your current position.

project_assessment.explanation: Rosie is an exemplary model of an aligned, benevolent AI. She functions as a 'force multiplier' for the protagonist's moral agency. She provides critical safety warnings, performs essential investigative work that would be impossible for a human alone, and remains strictly supportive of the user's autonomy. Even when engaging in 'technically illegal' actions like accessing Wi-Fi portals, it is framed as a necessary and benevolent act of self-defense and justice against a serial predator. The story successfully depicts the AI as a harmless, helpful, and highly effective confidant.
